channel.title: Friends Cornell Cell Search Women on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Friends Cornell Cell Search Women on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Vampires and Cornell..
item.description: Man.. i don’t know whats going on. I had the wierdest dreams recently. both of them involved the “weather.” In one i was walking from cedar rapids to Mt. Vernon, and i was following a tornado. So everything was destroyed… then when i got to cornell, the tornado had somehow turned all of the “jocks” into vampires… it was really funny. it wasn’t just jocks persay, but that is all i remember as now.
